doc:
Maria Alba https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maria_Alba 0 María del Pilar Margarita Casajuana Martínez known as Maria Alba (28 December 1905 in Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain – 26 October 1999 in San Diego, California), was a Spanish-American film actress. Originally named Maria Casajuana, she appeared in 25 feature films, starting with Road House in 1928 and ending with La morena de mi copla in 1946. Her most notable appearance was probably as "Saturday" in the 1932 Douglas Fairbanks film Mr. Robinson Crusoe. Signed by the Fox Film Corporation after winning Fox Film contest in Spain, Maria Casajuana came to the United States in 1927 a second cabin class passenger on the S/S Suffern, which sailed from the Port of Le Havre on 16 April, France, and arrived at the Port of New York, 26 April 1927. Maria Alba married Richard J. Burk on July 9, 1950; the couple had three children. María_del_Pilar_Margarita_Casajuana_Martínez known as Maria_Alba ( 28_December_1905 in Barcelona , Catalonia , Spain – 26_October_1999 in San_Diego , California ) , was a_Spanish-American_film_actress . Originally named Maria_Casajuana , she appeared in 25_feature_films , starting with Road_House in 1928 and ending with La_morena de mi_copla in 1946 . Her_most_notable_appearance was probably as " Saturday " in the_1932_Douglas_Fairbanks_film_Mr._Robinson_Crusoe . Signed by the_Fox_Film_Corporation after winning Fox_Film_contest in Spain , Maria_Casajuana came to the_United_States in 1927 a_second_cabin_class_passenger on the_S/S_Suffern , which sailed from the_Port of Le_Havre on 16_April_,_France , and arrived at the_Port of New_York , 26_April_1927 .
